snippet: Saturday’s verdicts will determine the culpability of police officers and officials in Port Said’s soccer club who were on duty at the time of the riot in February 2012.
abstract: Saturday’s verdicts will determine the culpability of police officers and officials in Port Said’s soccer club who were on duty at the time of the riot in February 2012.

headline.main: As Police Strike, Egypt Tensely Awaits Verdicts in Soccer Riot
